text:
Man:
Is there a problem here, Rog?

Yes, I am a victim
of an injustice.

You'll speak
when asked to, ma'am.

Sabine, we've been as reasonable
as we can about all this,

but since you're refusing
to cooperate,

I have no choice
but to do my duty.

What?
But I haven't done anything.

You're not really helping
your case, ma'am.

- Roger: The law is the law.
- I don't believe this.
Are you people humans or robots?

Injustice, abuse of power,
and blind ignorance.

Three powerful plagues
that can cause

even the most stable
of souls to waver.

It's our responsibility 
to tip her over the brink

so she can become
a choice weapon
against Ladybug and Cat Noir.
( all gasping )
Qilin, I am Shadow Moth.

They put you in handcuffs
despite your innocence.

Thanks to me,
you can repair this injustice.
I refuse to hurt anyone!

You can keep your power,
you devious insect.

Ah, you're judging me
without knowing me
when I'm actually just like you,
a victim of misunderstanding.

And like you, I don't want
to hurt anyone.

- I don't believe you.
- Here's proof.

If you accept,
I will offer you a mighty power

to accomplish
your noble mission.
So be it!

When all the injustices
have been righted,
peace will prevail.

You've reached Sabine
Dupain-Cheng's voicemail.
This is so weird, Tikki.

My mom would never
have just left me like this.
( sirens wailing )
Huh?

Roger: You're under arrest!
Give yourself up now!

Qilin:
Take these handcuffs off me!

- Man: She's crazy!
- Oh, no!
What if Mom's in trouble?
Marinette: Tikki, spots on!

Man: There's no way
I'm going back there!
( grunting )
Thanks, Ladybug!
Where's Mom-- uh, my-- ma'am?

The ma'am
with the chouquettes?

She was arrested
by the police.
Arrested? There's no way.

Qilin:
You're unworthy of your mission.

Ignorance has corrupted
your souls.

Qilin will show you
the true meaning of justice!
Move the mountains!
( screaming )
Climb the lightning bolts!
Hang from the clouds!

General, use the armored trucks
to block the perimeter.
We need to attack from the west.

Ask for backup.
Get more backup.

Sir-- I mean, Mr. Mayor,
where are those tanks

you promised
and the fighter jets?
Qilin: Quake the earth!
I am innocent.
Get these handcuffs off me,

otherwise it's you
who will suffer
under the weight of injustice.

Stop. You're putting
innocent lives in danger.

Shadow Moth:
Ladybug.

Where was she
when your innocence
was in question, Qilin?

Don't listen to this hypocrite.
Take her Miraculous!

If they're serving injustice,
then they are not innocent.
And if you defend them,

then you're not on the side
of justice either.
Careful, milady.

The weather forecast
predicted a shower of objects.

Good think you got your
staff umbrella then, kitty cat.

First one to catch her
gets to release the butterfly.
This isn't a game, Cat Noir!
Roll back the waves!
Huh?

- Whoo-hoo!
- Capture the rainbow!

- ( grunts )
- ( screaming )
